title: Random Question
body:
Cats or Dogs?

Me, I'm all in for dogs{{champion:103}}

replies.body: He didn't have a poll because it was too obvious who was going to win. Cats of course.

Uhh, who dafuq wants a cat?

(I'm talk to all the people who have hayfever)
cats because dog people are always assholes about how they think about cats.
Where is the poll? I'm going to go dogs.
